name: Lagunita
description:
Use arrow keys and A, S on a regular keyboard.

Small videogame for the Arduboy portable game system created for the #gmtkjam and #LOWREZJAM game jams.

One of the themes for #LOWREZJAM is western, so I went for a western style.

The theme for the #gmtkjam is "Only One" and this game matches the theme as "Only One dimension of building", "Only One color" and since Arduboy is an 8-bit machine, "Only One byte" :-D

The game is a SimCity like city builder, only in one dimension.

Use the D-Pad right and left to scroll your town around the Lagunita lake.

Use the D-Pad up and down to change the type of building that you want to build.

Use the A button to build the building.

Use the B button to go back.

Some buildings generate some income per second while some other ones have a maintenance cost.

NOTE: The game is still under development.

DISCLAIMER: the intended final resolution will be 128x64, but I'll limit it at 64x64 to comply with the #LOWREZJAM for the whole duration of the voting.
